main.name: Robert Liu
main.description: A Software Engineering student at the University of Waterloo
main.bio: I am a hard-working software engineering student at the University of Waterloo (GPA: 3.8), with couple years of experience in Computer Contest (NOI). Also, I have some project and work experience in Machine Learning, Deep Learning and OpenCV.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Major in Software Engineering, combination of CS and ECE.

work.title: AI Engineer Intern
work.description_1: Created datetime features from time series problems to generate labels for partitioning time sequence to predict future ads performance and to make suggestions on optimizing YOOZOO Games’ budget.
work.description_2: Engaged in feature engineering through Potential User Analysis using feature analysis techniques like PCA, LightGBM.
work.description_3: Evaluated YOOZOO Games’ Advertising performance using cost per action (CPA) and other metrics by analyzing the ads release platform policies.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description_1: Implemented robot position detection algorithm for an AI exhibition guide.
work.description_2: Designed a socket platform and messaging protocol for transforming messages to communicate between C++ and Python.
work.description_3: Improved data transfer speeds by over 10 times as opposed to using Cpython in C++.

testimonials.text: 生活最好的状态就是冷冷清清中的风风火火
如果你站的足够高你就会发现大地是星空的一部分
